section.title: Page Abstract
section.para: Launchpad hosts the Cinder project. The Cinder project homepage on Launchpad is http://launchpad.net/cinder.

section.title: Launchpad credentials
section.para: Creating a login on Launchpad is important even if you don't use the Launchpad site itself, since Launchpad credentials are used for logging in on several OpenStack-related sites. These sites include:

section.title: Mailing list
section.para: The mailing list email is openstack@lists.openstack.org. This is a common mailing list across the OpenStack projects. To participate in the mailing list:
The mailing list archives are at http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack/.

section.title: Feature requests (Blueprints)
section.para: Cinder uses Launchpad Blueprints to track feature requests. Blueprints are at https://blueprints.launchpad.net/cinder.

section.title: Technical support (Answers)
section.para: Cinder uses Launchpad Answers to track Cinder technical support questions. The Cinder Answers page is at https://answers.launchpad.net/cinder.
Note that Ask OpenStack (which is not hosted on Launchpad) can also be used for technical support requests.
